name: Coral Audit
short_description:
Currently risks and controls are managed in large corporates using Microsoft's Excel software. This results in:

- Linear working practices (only one person can work on a doc at one time)
- No audit trail of who changed what
- Need to transpose large amounts of data from one file to another resulting in data integrity issues and wasted labour
- Unintuitive interface requires large amounts of training 
- No fixed process template and no way to ensure this has been followed

Coral Audit solves this by replacing Excel with a Web2.0 application that resolves all of these issues. Opensource and utilising industry-standard enterprise software platforms, it is built from the ground up by practicing risk experts in financial services. The app is intuitive, secure and reduces man hours by >80% compared to the existing Excel approach.
summary: Opensource app to manage risk & controls in large finance institutions
